key_responsibilities: Serve as the primary spokesperson for the Congresswoman
Develop and maintain strong relationships with reporters, editors, producers, bookers and social media influencers
Proactively engage in media outreach, including pitching and fielding press inquiries
Manage the development of press releases, speeches and op-eds
Oversee an ambitious digital communications program
Supervise a Press Secretary and Digital Strategist
Prepare and staff the Congresswoman for press events and interviews
Work collaboratively with the District Office to ensure strong local media engagement
requirements: ability to think strategically, work collaboratively, and manage an ambitious communications program in a fast-paced setting under tight deadlines

office: House Committee on Energy and Commerce Democratic Staff (majority)
key_responsibilities: ensuring that office and meeting rooms are kept in order
supporting staff in preparations for committee events
delivering documents and obtaining signatures on letters
maintaining both digital and paper records and files

assisting other staff with research, work product, web content, special projects, and other duties as assigned

key_responsibilities: assisting the Member in responding to constituent issues and problems with federal agencies
staying on top of everyday events in the Member’s district
keeping the community connected to the Member’s work
assisting with neighborhood events and visits community groups in the district

ability to handle multiple tasks and issues effectively
significant experience interacting with the public
working knowledge or strong interest in the District of Columbia and its local government
willingness to become a resident of the District of Columbia

key_responsibilities: writing floor speeches and committee statements
handling meetings with constituents and interest groups on behalf of Member

key_responsibilities: coordinating with legislative staff to prepare responses
organizing and sorting all incoming constituent inquiries
ensuring that outgoing responses are sent in a timely manner
reporting findings to senior staff and the Member
responding to constituent requests for general information

key_responsibilities: assisting the District Director with tracking office expenses, certificate requests, canopy requests, and Congressional Record statement requests
